page.title: 10MADELEY FARMS
page.content: There are several farms within our area, and children visited three and came up with the following information: POOL FARM. Owner Mr.Bedson. 75 acres (30 acres silage, 30 acres permanent pasture, 15 acres barley). Farm used mainly to fatten beef cattle. MORE HALL FARM. Owner Mr. Wood. Approx 150 acres (80 acres permanent pasture and grazing, 50 acres meadowland for haymaking, 20 acres barley. 20 milking cows. A mixed/dairy farm. BIRCHES FARM. Owner Mr. Sant. The largest farm visited, 210 acres (100 acres temporary grassland used for hay and silage, 60 acres permanent pasture/ grazing, 50 acres barley). It is mainly a dairy farm with 114 milking cows.
